body:
Update Rclone to 1.56.0 which includes bug fixes and new supported backends.

**Changelog:**
- New backends -- Uptobox (buengese).
- Rework config system so it can be used non-interactively via cli and rc API.
- Librclone - export the rclone RC as a C library.
- Accounting: Calculate rolling average speed.

The full changelog can be found [here](https://rclone.org/changelog/#v1-56-0-2021-07-20).

**Test Plan:**
Rclone 1.56.0 built successfully within the Autamus Pipeline [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/runs/3124657690).
title: Add Rclone v1.56.0
